meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cephalexins to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Cephalexins are commonly used to treat various bacterial illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the cephalexins, knowing they would be defeated.
meanings.sent4: The cephalexins acted like brave soldiers battling the harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The cephalexins worked tirelessly to protect the body from harmful invaders.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'cephalexin'.
meanings.sent1: She bought two bottles of cephalexins from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent2: The cephalexins in the cabinet were running low.
meanings.sent3: The cephalexins on the shelf seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The cephalexins lined up neatly on the shelf, like little soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cephalexins brightened up the dull room.
